channel.title: Switching Caches
channel.description:
Well I'm'm having a prob with a cache were the past owner was messing around with the models folder and left it be when the client was released. So some of the global objects such as fence is not the right model, yet I have the same cache but the items are messed up, so here is my question.
How do I switch the object models from one cache to another? Switching the working object models to the other cache? Don't say use Tom Suite, but the question is asking what to move in Tom Suite?
Thanks for your help

item.title: Switching Caches
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

asshole_rule:

i think item/object/npc models are stored in idx1, but i dont really remember

kk ill check it out and thanks for the help

Read full topic
